main event: On June 16, 1955, in Baltimore, Maryland, a large white disc type vehicle was observed. It changed color from red, white to blue, made no sound, stood still as the timer flickered, and then changed direction suddenly before moving in a straight line.
interesting points: The object changed color from red, white, to blue, and made no sound.
It stood still as the timer flickered, then changed direction suddenly and moved in a straight line.
The report includes 9 photographs of the object.
The conclusion of the observation was that it was possibly a balloon due to the object's characteristics.
